My Favorite Placeholder Texts & Images

May 7, 2016 â€¢ Jamie Pilgrim

As a designer & developer, I've spent the past 10+ years needing placeholders while I build designs. While photos of my cats and vanilla Lorem Ipsum do the job, they get stale. Cure the Flava! Here's a list of my favorite (and easy to use) text and image placeholder generators.


Why use Placeholders?

The Go-To Ipsums

Cat Ipsum

Lorem Dimsum

Hipster Ipsum

Place Kitten

Lorempixel
